On Fri, Apr 05, 2002 at 08:10:02AM -0600, Tauzell, Dave wrote:
> 
> assertMatchesRegex( "/\d\d-\d\d-\d\d\d\d", "4-30-2002" );

With the latest jdk 1.4 this can be easily done as
  
  assertTrue(Pattern.matches("\d\d-\d\d-\d\d\d\d", "4-30-2002"));

Contrary to the assertContains I see no really gained value here.
